channel.title: PI (better mage tank) mage on d'hide, kharils, morrigans splash?
channel.description: Basically, what do ihave to do to make it so mage splashes and hits lower on kharils and all those items?

item.title: PI (better mage tank) mage on d'hide, kharils, morrigans splash?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Make it check if you’re wearing “those items” and if you are they have a lower defense to mage hits

Read full topic
